title: Shutting down the comments
author: VD
content_html: The Tennessee Trainwreck is off his meds again, so comments will be turned off until further notice. I’m far too busy to waste my time on policing gammas, monomaniacs, and the mentally ill. So, for the time being, only moderators will be able to comment on posts.
content_text:
The Tennessee Trainwreck
is off his meds again
, so comments will be turned off until further notice. I’m far too busy to waste my time on policing gammas, monomaniacs, and the mentally ill. So, for the time being, only moderators will be able to comment on posts.
